name: 60FPS project player mode
description: Alt+Click the green flag to toggle 60FPS.

info.text: Most projects will not behave properly when running at 60FPS, because increasing the framerate also increases the speed at which scripts run. This should only be used on projects that support 60FPS.
If your browser is in Energy Saver mode (e.g. if your battery is low), it may limit the visible framerate and using this addon may not appear to make animations smoother.
